item.title: EP 357 - The Windy War For Your Mind
item.itunes:title: The Windy War For Your Mind
item.description:
Today we find a mysterious SD card, try not to be cooked alive, and then we find out wind turbines may make you kill people with a hammer!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Minecraft Server

deadrabbitradio171191.apexmc.co

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Police: Memory card depicts woman’s killing, man in custody

https://www.apnews.com/97f965d6f6f94a17ba194eac9ae9a9a3

 

An SD card found on an Alaska street showed a woman's murder. Now a man is arrested.

https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/sd-card-found-alaska-street-showed-woman-s-murder-now-n1064531?fbclid=IwAR3Suf8EHIsJyMVRaYDCniMWCUys8Q54kGdpUQOapHFnSOtFu7wnMckHol8

 

Brian Steven Smith: 5 Fast Facts You Need to Know

https://heavy.com/news/2019/10/brian-steven-smith/

 

Wife of ‘memory card’ murder suspect Brian Smith shocked at his ‘dark’ side

https://nypost.com/2019/10/24/wife-of-memory-card-murder-suspect-brian-smith-shocked-at-his-dark-side/

Bumble Bee forced to pay $6M for worker cooked alive

https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2015/08/13/bumble-bee-forced-pay-6m-worker-cooked-alive/31620881/

 

Death by boiling

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_by_boiling

 

What Happens to Your Body When You’re Boiled to Death 

https://www.ranker.com/list/what-being-boiled-is-like/laura-allan

 

Man Burns to Death Rescuing Dog from Hot Springs

https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/hope-springs-eternal/

 

Authorities End Search for Man Who Fell Into Yellowstone Hot Spring

https://www.snopes.com/news/2016/06/09/authorities-end-search-for-man-who-fell-into-hot-spring-at-yellowstone-national-park/

 

Turbines

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2363483/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1

 

Wind turbine syndrome

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wind_turbine_syndrome

 

Waubra Foundation

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Waubra_Foundation

 

The sickening truth about wind farm syndrome

https://www.newscientist.com/article/mg21628850-200-the-sickening-truth-about-wind-farm-syndrome/

 

“Inconvenient Truths: Wind Turbine Syndrome” (CounterPunch Magazine)

https://www.windturbinesyndrome.com/2010/wind-turbine-syndrome-pierpont/?var=wts

 

Adverse health effects of industrial wind turbines

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3653647/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
